nodes.name: Basic LLM Chain

parameters.text:
=ini ada base64 invoice rangkumkan Pengeluaran dari invoice tersebut Nama Barang jumlah dan Pengeluaran masing masing barang dan total, outputnya jangan panjang panjang saya cukup berikan 

date: DD-MM-YYYY ( Jika dari OCR tidak ada tanggal ambil tanggal hari ini )
id:
name:
 qty: 
price:
 total:
category:
tax : (jika di total berbeda dengan item brati ada pajak nya hitungkan juga pajaknya masukan kesini)

untuk pilihan categorynya : Food & Beverage / Transportation / Utilities / Shopping / Healthcare / Entertaiment / Housing / Education

dalam bentuk JSON array object, berikan juga key message summary untuk rangkuman, berikan rangkauman singkat total pengeluaran dan barang apa saja yang dibeli serta jumlah nya berikan juga pajaknya

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# N8N Financial Tracker Telegram Invoices to Notion with AI Summaries & Reports

## Overview
Automated workflow: N8N Financial Tracker Telegram Invoices to Notion with AI Summaries & Reports. This workflow integrates 14 different services: stickyNote, telegramTrigger, telegram, code, lmChatGoogleGemini. It contains 33 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 33
- **Node Types**: 14
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Google Gemini Chat Model**: lmChatGoogleGemini
- **Basic LLM Chain**: chainLlm
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Schedule Trigger | for send chart report**: scheduleTrigger
- **Get Recent Data from Notions**: notion
- **Summarize Transaction Data**: summarize
- **Generate Chart**: quickChart
- **Send Chart Image to Group or Private Chat**: telegram
- **Convert Data to JSON chart payload**: code
- ... and 23 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
